publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6332 Dave Thompson: Congratulations to Uyeasound Primary Schoolâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Uyeasound Primary School in Unst on receiving an exceptional report on its recent school inspection; recognises that this is down to the hard work and dedication of the Head Teacher, Ms Kate Coutts, the staff and the pupils of the school; acknowledges that the input of parents and the local community has also been pivotal in this well-deserved report, and encourages everyone involved to continue with their good work to ensure that the school continues to perform in this manner for the good of the children in attendance. Supported by: Alasdair Allan*, Rob Gibson*, Michael Matheson*, Sandra White*, Jamie McGrigor*, Bill Kidd*, Mary Scanlon*
S3M-6332 Congratulations to Uyeasound Primary School (lodged on 18 May 2010) Stuart McMillan*, Bob Doris*, Gil Paterson*
